ValidationRule.description: Prevent anyone except system admin for changing Employee Number(HR PersonID)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( AND (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")),NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"Core Zone Administration")),NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"MMS Sales ZSA")),NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HRS Regional Sales Admin")),NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HNBF Sales Administration")), $Profile.Name <>"2008-09 Operations Administration",$Profile.Name <>"2008-09 MMS Hub Manager - DA",$Profile.Name <>"HRS PEO Centric Administration",$Profile.Name <>"2008-09 HRS Premier Support - DA",$Profile.Name <>"2008-09 HRS Premier Safety Delegated Admin",$Profile.Name <>"HR Essentials",$Profile.Name <>"MPSC Profile",$Profile.Name <>"Field Ops Regional Assistant",$Profile.Name <>"PEO New Business Delegated Admin",$Profile.Name <>"PIA Agency Delegated Admin",$Profile.Name <>"Sales Data Steward",$Profile.Name<>"Sales Enablement"),$Profile.Name <>"PEO New Business Delegated Admin",$Profile.Name <>"NSS Manager Admin", $Profile.Name <> "BeneTrac Operations", ISCHANGED( EmployeeNumber ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: ** This field can only be changed by the System Administrator and Approved Delegated Administrator Personnel **
